data_variables.name: plt
data_variables.description: Matplotlib library used for creating static, animated, and interactive visualizations in Python.

data_variables.name: np
data_variables.description: NumPy library used for numerical computations, particularly with arrays.

data_variables.name: pd
data_variables.description: Pandas library for data manipulation and analysis, primarily used to work with data in DataFrame format.

data_flow.creation: Imported as part of Matplotlib for plotting visualizations.
data_flow.flow: Used in functions for plotting data, such as plotPerColumnDistribution, plotCorrelationMatrix, plotScatterMatrix.

data_flow.creation: Imported for numerical operations. Used for array manipulation and checks in various functions.
data_flow.flow: Used in calculations for analyzing data (e.g., histograms in plotPerColumnDistribution, correlation coefficient in plotScatterMatrix).

data_flow.creation: Imported for data handling and processing, particularly to work with dataframes.
data_flow.flow: Used to read, manipulate, and visualize data in functions.
